com.fortify.util.rest.connection

Interface IRestConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRestConnection, ADORestConnection, ArcherAuthenticatingRestConnection, ArcherBasicRestConnection, FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection, FoDBasicRestConnection, JiraRestConnection, OctaneAuthenticatingRestConnection, OctaneBasicRestConnection, RestConnection, RestConnectionWithCredentials, SSCAuthenticatingRestConnection, SSCBasicRestConnection

    public interface IRestConnection
extends AutoCloseable
    Interface providing low-level methods for building and executing REST requests.
    Author:
    Ruud Senden
